<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81475</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4525</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Prescribed Novel 2 -- Gli Occhiali dOro</string>
            <string language="es">Novela 2 recomendada - Gli Occhiali dOro</string>
            <string language="ga">Úrscéal Éigeantach 2 – Gli Occhiali dOro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorgeschriebener Roman 2 -- Gli Occhiali dOro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Roman prescrit 2 -- dOro de Gli Occhiali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Novela prescrita 2 -- dOro de Gli Occhiali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Romanzo prescritto 2 -- dOro di Gli Occhiali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ορισμένο μυθιστόρημα 2 -- Gli Occhiali dOro</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Information and headings under which to study Giorgio Bassanis novel "Gli Occhiali dOro", including suggestions for discussion of themes and essay writing. A good knowledge of Italian is required to read the novel in the original.</string>
            <string language="es">Información y directrices para estudiar la novela "Gli Occhiali dOro” de Giorgio Bassanis, donde se incluyen sugerencias para coloquios sobre temas y redacciones. Se necesita un buen conocimiento de italiano para leer la novela en versión original.</string>
            <string language="ga">Eolas agus teidil chun staidéar a dhéanamh ar úrscéal Giorgio Bassanis “Gli Occhiali dOra”, lena n-áirítear moltaí chun plé a dhéanamh ar théamaí agus aistí a scríobh. Tá iodáilis mhaith ag teastáil chun an t-úrscéal a léamh sa chéad áit.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Italian</string>
            <string language="es">Italiano. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Iodáilis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationen und unter denen Kopftexte, zum 
Giorgio Bassanis des Romans "Gli Occhiali dOro" zu studieren, 
einschließlich Vorschläge für Diskussion über Themen und 
Versuchschreiben. Ein gutes Wissen des Italieners wird 
benoetigt, den Roman in der Vorlage zu lesen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'information et entêtes sous lesquelles pour 
étudier le roman de Giorgio Bassanis "dOro de Gli Occhiali", y 
compris des suggestions pour la discussion des thèmes et de 
l'écriture d'essai. Une bonne connaissance d'Italien est 
exigée de lire le roman dans l'original.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Informação e títulos sob que para estudar a 
novela de "dOro de Giorgio Bassanis Gli Occhiali", including 
sugestões para a discussão dos temas e da escrita do essay. Um
conhecimento bom do italiano é requerido ler a novela no original.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le informazioni ed intestazioni sotto cui per 
studiare il romanzo "dOro di Giorgio Bassanis di Gli Occhiali", 
compreso i suggerimenti per la discussione sui temi e sulla scrittura 
di saggio. Una buona conoscenza di italiano è richiesta leggere
il romanzo nell'originale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πληροφορίες και τίτλοι κάτω από τους οποίους να 
μελετήσει το Giorgio Bassanis νέο "Gli Occhiali 
dOro", συμπεριλαμβανομένων των προτάσεων για τη συζήτηση των 
θεμάτων και του γραψίματος δοκίμιου. Μια καλή γνώση 
ιταλικών απαιτείται για να διαβάσει το μυθιστόρημα στον αρχικό.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Italienisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Italien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Italiano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Italiano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιταλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
